ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who bear the load (of rain),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: which carry clouds laden with water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by the clouds which are heavily loaded with water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then by oath of those which carry the burdens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then those clouds bearing the load (of minute things in space).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those that bear the burden (of the rain)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and those that bear the burden [of the rain],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the clouds bearing a load.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And those that lift and bear away heavy weights;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (the clouds) that bear heavy weight of water;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then the bearers of weight (the clouds),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:2] and those that bear, the clouds that bear moisture [as], a burden (wiqran is the direct object of al-hāmilat, ‘those that bear’);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those that bear the burden (of the rain)) and He swears by the heavy clouds which carry rain,
